Shift Managers perform a variety of tasks, which may include planning for each shift, monitoring performance during the shift, taking action to ensure the team is meeting McDonald’s standards, monitoring safety, security, and profitability, and communicating with the next Shift Manager to help prepare him/her to run a great shift, too.
4. Shift Managers may also be responsible for meeting targets during their shifts and for helping their assigned Departments meet their goals.
5. You must be 18 years or older to be a manager in our restaurants.
